title:
Regional Job Market Data from the German Federal Employment Agency
    (Bundesagentur für Arbeit -- BA)
text: badata data package provides data German Federal Employment Agency (Bundesagentur für Arbeit – BA) unemployed persons, employees, jobs Germany 2012 2021 district (Kreis) occupational group.

title:
